'''''O Evangelho da Terra-Média: Leituras Teológico-literárias da Obra de J. R. R. Tolkien''''' is a Brazilian academic book that collects many articles about Tolkien and his relationship with theology and philosophy.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articlename=O Evangelho da Terra-Média: Leituras Teológico-literárias da Obra de J. R. R. Tolkien|articleurl=http://www.mackenzie.br/tolkien.html|dated=|website=[http://mackenzie.br/ Portal Mackenzie]|accessed=26 Feb 2014}}</ref>

==From the publisher==

{{blockquote|The book presents a reading of literary elements in Tolkien's works. Experienced in the use of tools of analysis and literary criticism, the authors give prominence to an important aspect of Tolkien's work, not always well perceived: their religious and theological element.}}
